metadata.description: A hauntingly beautiful structure with an ever-changing fa√ßade, its walls whispering ancient secrets to those who listen.

atmosphere.lighting: Flickering luminescent orbs casting an otherworldly glow
atmosphere.sounds: Whispering walls, soft chanting, and distant, mournful sighs
atmosphere.scents: Incense, forgotten knowledge, and the hint of mystical energies

metadata.significance: A sacred site where the El Dorian gods are said to communicate with mortals through whispers and echoes.
